short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refreshes your tabs and keeps site sessions open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of getting logged out of certain sites because of your session expiring/inactivity? This chrome extension will refresh your tabs for you for specified sites and KEEP YOU LOGGED IN! Enjoy!
